text:
Hello Mr [redacted_name] how are you?
Yes you are right market is doing good and i made good money.
But because of fluctuation and uncertainty you cant really risk too much to make too much .
Yes i told you the way i am successful at trading now i have high chance to pay you before end of the year and that really still is my goal.
But as i said fluctuation doesnt let me to risk a lot to make a lot
For example 2 times i went heavily to NVDA ONE time from $140 dropped to $92 and another time from $130 dropped to $102
I covered the lost and made good money on top of what i lost
But doesnt let you go all in
Also rate cut
Last 14 times after rate cut 10 times we went in recession because of too late of rate cut
And last 2 times when market went up when the crash happened after all time high after almost one to one and half year market went down between %30-%45 , why i say these things because i told Akash too i want really to make up this and the people that i do their investment they didnt distribute on July and they said lets do it on October also i told Akash that im in the process of lawsuit i did with a little money to increase it step by step because really i was struggling even to pay my bills but this system that i created is a game changer Ms [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] are aware of it .
Long story short from this month i will pay [redacted_name] some money until next month i see how much i will get i will pay half of that to you .
Thank you
Also me and you suppose to meet?
ğŸ˜‰
